title: 159: How To Slide In Her DMs with Sofia Franklyn
itunes:title: How To Slide In Her DMs with Sofia Franklyn
description:
The boys are joined by podcaster Sofia Franklyn for some absolute lunacy. They riff on which porn star Sofia wants to bang, why being a mormon sister wife would be cool, and how disrespectful wearing AirPods during sex is. They also determine if its possible to look hot in whitey-tighties and hear from a listener with a royalty fetish.Â 

Follow Sofia @sofiafranklyn on all platforms
